name: Santa's DOOM
description:
On the eve of the 24th, each year Rudolph starts heading back to the north pole to prepare for the journey around the world, to deliver presents to each child. But during his flight, he was shot down by a massive snow ball and was encountered by an army of snowmen.

~~~  How to play  ~~~
WASD to move
1 / 2 to change weapon
Pick up ammo, health and armor from the ground
Find the keys to proceed
Avoid projectiles from enemies

~~~ Art ~~~
